Text: really? thanks.. glad I waited to watch this

is the audio quite echoey, i had another version ending "fanta" video was ok, but the audio whilst very audible resembled what happens if you set your soundcard to concert hall ...  slightly echoey

no read above on my second comment this has no echo it is a line feed with a little background garble. just a little noise in the line , and that has been effectively squashed by the encoder as shown in a sample provided.. for most  people it is as good as dvd
